thread.title: Cops: Priest Pulled Gun On 8-Year-Old Because He Was A Cowboys Fan
thread.title_full: Cops: Priest Pulled Gun On 8-Year-Old Because He Was A Cowboys Fan

author: krepitch
title: Cops: Priest Pulled Gun On 8-Year-Old Because He Was A Cowboys Fan
text: Cops: Priest Pulled Gun On 8-Year-Old Because He Was A Cowboys Fan Quote: Father Kevin Carter of St. Margaret of Cortona in Little Ferry, Nj. was arrested on Friday and charged with one count of fourth degree aggravated assault with a firearm and one count of third degree endangering the welfare of a child for an incident that occurred back on September 13. According to Bergen County prosecutor John Molinelli, Carter pointed an antiquated Civil War-era musket, which apparently was still functioning, at the boy and said, Im going to shoot you. The reason, according to Molinelli, was: The young boy was apparently a fan of a particular football team, the priest was not. So perhaps we have indication it started out as that. Carter is a Giants fan and that other football team is apparently the Dallas Cowboys, according to persecutors [sic]. You may recall that September 13 was the day that the Giants and Cowboys faced off and the Giants laid down a truly impressive collapse.
